Body.Content:
We have scheduled an update to the msdyn_AppProfileManagerAnchor package in your Dynamics 365 Customer Service environment to address an issue we identified with the Channel Integration Framework (CIF) version 1.

How does this affect me?
This update will be deployed to your environment during your regional maintenance window beginning on March 21, 2025.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Please contact Microsoft Support and reference ICM511056260 if you have any questions.

Title: Dynamics 365 Customer Service â€“ Update to msdyn_AppProfileManagerAnchor  package
